clinical_history: Patient presents with cough and fever.
findings: Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in left lower lobe.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 48 mm in diameter.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left lower lobe.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in left lower lobe.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
